name: Ankylomon
description: Ankylomon is a gargantuan Ankylosaurus magniventris covered all over with osteoderms, armor plates and scutes. It has green eyes and a helmet-like covering with a pair of massive horn-like scutes. Each of its legs wears spiked collars. It has a purple belly and has an iron spiked ball mace on the end of its tail.
